name: Colin Cooper Racing
description:
Disclaimer: Due to the use of the gyroscope. This game can only be played with iPhone4+ and iPad2+. Anything beneath these models will not be able to play this game.

It’s that time of year again folks where the Colin’s Championship is on the line for the best driver out there! Choose your car and drive across 4 four crazy homemade race tracks, against great competitors. You will need to come 1st in all four tracks to win the championship and advance to the next track. You have a selection of some of the coolest looking coopers to choose from; but which will be your championship car? Best of luck to all race drivers who will accept the challenge.
